description: The Defence Department requires 16 all--terrain, four wheel drive motorcycle will have all four--seat options for the regulator vehicles.
full_summary:
================================>

### Tender Notice

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) - All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV) Youth, 2x4 4 Stroke Gasoline Engine

**Contract Reference:** PW-23-01020293
**Solicitation Reference:** W8476-236622/A
**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence

[In English]
**Note:** The requirement is open to suppliers who can fulfill the needs of the Army, including foreign and domestic providers.

We are seeking proposals for the supply of

* Sixteen (16) All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV) Youth, 2x4 4 Stroke Gasoline Engine each with a standard equipment package

**Commercial Items:**

* The requirement includes the purchase of All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV) Youth by the Government

 **commercialOff_the_shelf products - Add translation where necessary**

* The items required are available on the market and are commercial off the shelf products.
 
**Purchase Information:**

* The expected delivery date is 240 days from the contract award date.
* The delivery location is Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Gander, Newfoundland and Labrador.

 **Trade agreement:**

* This proposal is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information:**

* Department of National Defence, Bldg. 201, 101 Colonel By Dr., Ottawa, Ontario K1A0K2
* [Lee, Wo il](mailto:woil.lee@forces.gc.ca)




- Original entry's original publication date [06 Jan 2023]
   Tender Closing Date [09 Feb 2023 @ 2:00 pm POLM]

### Conditions of Tendering

Proposals must be submitted electronically in accordance with the solicitation document to ensure timely receipt.

Note that there is no penalty for not fulfilling the requirements precisely as laid out in the request for tenders; everyone will be acknowledged.

This proposal is submitted to comply with Statutory Goods Ordinance 12/H.B 12.
